# Transparency Token 

## Issued Token with Receipts

### Protected Header

~~~ json
{
  "alg": "ES384",
  "b64": false,
  "crit": [
    "b64"
  ],
  "kid": "https://issuer.example/issuers/4fd94f63-4e8d-4ba0-8b08-496c6087acf0#bHTwGBmJPkHc4R2-8AmKl_n2AQbCg6CsFIEW5kamLfA",
  "typ": "application/cool+jose",
  "cty": "text/plain; charset=utf-8",
  "jwt_claims": {
    "cnf": {
      "kid": "https://subject.example/subjects/6320cb92-fffe-4538-8c82-2ad3b6e7fbf8#f8kXvkrAB6z4gCbXxP9wDrn3w0EkYHHkKwX3uoFEMH0"
    },
    "iat": 1700763222,
    "_sd_hash_alg": "sha-256",
    "iss": "https://issuer.example/issuers/4fd94f63-4e8d-4ba0-8b08-496c6087acf0",
    "sub": "https://subject.example/subjects/6320cb92-fffe-4538-8c82-2ad3b6e7fbf8"
  }
}
~~~

### Unprotected Header

~~~ json
{
  "receipts": [
    "..8Cr9Jn2LVbdfdDqbbcBkZmqhok9Q4qJNFT-EIyRBOByfzFqcdXmKrdW86Ex74Vd3iM0zx-CoLnOEgcFoqa86kh0roY4-UqHH266Cd5uEXCkwZzpA2_p7t2sDCEjLfgJ4~eyJwcm9vZnMiOnsiaW5jbHVzaW9uIjpbIlcxMCJdfX0"
  ]
}
~~~

### JSON

~~~ text
{
  "protected": "",
  "unprotected": {
    "receipts": [
      "..8Cr9Jn2LVbdfdDqbbcBkZmqhok9Q4qJNFT-EIyRBOByfzFqcdXmKrdW86Ex74Vd3iM0zx-CoLnOEgcFoqa86kh0roY4-UqHH266Cd5uEXCkwZzpA2_p7t2sDCEjLfgJ4~eyJwcm9vZnMiOnsiaW5jbHVzaW9uIjpbIlcxMCJdfX0"
    ]
  },
  "payload": null,
  "signature": "VSki7JBken5HjDrRtPKowk0b7gRHcZAxyvUlRDMZUN6I4AgJvYz2SoeL5Ve7oTBHZTl3qaN49K-2HlAJUPVO1iLOn5d6rzzL1H_0XCjGHeQMXTuGlyBJOqgA_rAYk7Gr"
}
~~~

### Compact

~~~ text
..VSki7JBken5HjDrRtPKowk0b7gRHcZAxyvUlRDMZUN6I4AgJvYz2SoeL5Ve7oTBHZTl3qaN49K-2HlAJUPVO1iLOn5d6rzzL1H_0XCjGHeQMXTuGlyBJOqgA_rAYk7Gr~-ZXlKd2NtOXZabk1pT25zaWFXNWpiSFZ6YVc5dUlqcGJJbGN4TUNKZGZYMCJdfQ
~~~
